title: [FSX/P3D]  Milviz T-38A ADVANCED v3.151218 (Fixed Torrent)
description:
Previous torrent got ker-screwed up, sorry.   Re-seeding from scratch....


Here is the latest installer for Milviz's newest T-38A jet trainer add-on for FSX/FSX-SE/P3Dv3+.    To be clear, this is the new ADVANCED version with built-in failure modules and external flight dynamics engine.    A very fun little rocket to fly, albeit with a steep practical flying learning curve (a good thing for we serious simmers).     This version seems to have finally ironed-out a lot of the quirks that previous versions of the T-38 by Milviz have always seemed to have, while at the same time ramping up the flight model fidelity and realism bars.    Yay.     

DISCLAIMER: This was found 'elsewhere' and simply shared on here by me.    Any and all credit goes to the original uploader and cracker for sharing this (bless your bones).    A minimal effort for me to upload the torrent, but A LOT of effort by the original sharer/cracker.     THANK YOU fellow pirate!    :)

Note: If you have any previous versions of the Milviz T-38 currently installed on your setup, re-run your original installer and use the menu to uninstall beforehand.   Milviz's uninstallers are built into their installers in other words, instead of having a standalone uninstaller
